about.text1: Do you want tasty and quality sushi?
about.text2: We are the physical point TakiDa making sushi and rolls
about.text3: Sushi Odessa, Fast delivery of the best sushi in Odessa
about.text4: adequate prices and pleasant dishes, you will be satisfied with us, dispel all doubts, it is better not to find in Odessa. We have Japanese technology and cooking methodology.
about.text5: Logistics is thought out - we deliver on time.
about.text7: Order by phone or online. Quickly! Conveniently! Profitable!
about.text8: We accept orders - either by phone or on our website, where convenient navigation and detailed descriptions of all dishes allow you to place your order quickly and deliberately.
about.text9: Order rolls quickly - only here in Odessa in the Takida restaurant, leave your phone number and we will immediately contact you.

delivery.free: Free delivery in the city of Odessa is carried out when ordering from 250 hryvnia. The order amount for free delivery depends on the delivery address. You can obtain more detailed information from our manager by phone.
delivery.text1: Our internet site offers delivery of goods. All orders are carefully checked before shipping. Delivery time depends on the time of placing the order and preparation. Delivery is from Mon-Sun
delivery.text12: Having placed an order for sushi with us, you will receive only a quality and fresh product. Only here you can feel the pleasure of our food.
delivery.text2: You can pick up the order at the address
delivery.text3: Estimated delivery time in the city takes from 30 to 80 minutes.
delivery.text4: You can make a pre-order for a certain time, after specifying the details with the manager by phone.
delivery.text6: You can pay the order in cash to the courier upon delivery. You can pay for the order at the point of delivery for pickup, in cash or by credit card, at the address
delivery.text8: There are several ways to make an order
delivery.text9: Checkout the basket and delivery on the site

order.success: The order has been successfully placed!
